coreAttributes.name: Illuminarum
coreAttributes.description: A huge powermace handcrafted by a mastersmith primarch.

hitDescriptions.hitText: Gripping the mace with [npc.namePos] strength, [npc.name] [npc.verb(strike)] at [npc2.name], the mace pierces [npc2.herHim] with wrath.
Gripping the mace tightly, [npc.name] [npc.verb(slice)] [npc2.name] with rage and purpose.
Looking at [npc2.name], [npc.name] [npc.verb(take)] the Illuminarum in one hand thightly and [npc.verb(strike)] down [npc2.name]!

missDescriptions.missText: Gripping the mace with [npc.namePos] strength, [npc.name] [npc.verb(strike)] at [npc2.name], the mace grazes [npc2.herHim] with wrath. [npc2.Name] [npc.verb(dodge)] the mace but barely.
Gripping the mace tightly, [npc.name] [npc.verb(slice)] [npc2.name] with fierce speed. Giving [npc2.herHim] a chance to avoid the menacing Illuminarum.

Gazing upon [npc2.name], [npc.name] [npc.verb(take)] the Illuminarum with one hand and [npc.verb(strike)] down [npc2.name]! This pride however, was enough to give [npc2.Name] a chance to escape death.
